text.page:
475
101-238a @##/ /bod skad du/ snying rjes mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ gnod pa thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ 'byung po thams cad nges par bzlog pa/ sems can mi khom pa brgyad du lhung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad pa'i gzungs thugs rje chen po mi bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyis/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /'di lta ste/ o~M dza ta dza ta/ dzi ti dzi ti/ dzu tu dzu tu/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dus pa rjes su dgongs te gshegs su gsol/ tsa ta tsa ta/ tsi ti tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tu/ byang chub sems dpa'

476
101-238b thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sprin gyi rjes su dgongs te thugs rje chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegs su gsol/ /ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzhi las bzhengs su gsol/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e hi e hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol/ byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ /thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ /b+hu na b+hu na/ bi b+hu na bi b+hu na/ ma thA ma thA/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ /las sbyong du gsol/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ pad+ma A sa nA ya swA hA/ shwe tA dz+nyA u pa bI ti ya swA hA/ ki ri ta ne swA hA/ shU la ne swA hA/ tsakra Ne swA hA/ badzra Ne swA hA/ tri ne tre ya pra haM rU pA ya swA hA/ A kA shA ya swA hA/ shi ni shi ni swA hA/ pra tsa pa ta ye swA hA/ ya ma ye swA hA/ ya ma b+hud ya swA hA/ AN+Da dze b+h+yo b+hu te b+h+yaHswA hA/ dza ra yu dza b+h+yo b+hu te b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM swe da tshe b+h+yo b+hu te b+h+yaHswA hA/ a pa yu pa pa duHkhe+e b+h+yo b+h+ya te b+h+yaHswA hA/ bi ti ka b+h+yo b+hu te b+h+yaHswA hA/ be+e d+hi ta ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/ Sh+phaSh+Na ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/ sa na ni pa hi ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+h+yi b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba bud+d+ho swA hA/ sarba b+h+ya ti b+h+yaHswA hA/ b+hu me an+ta r-i Shi tsar+ye b+h+yo b+h+yaHswA hA/ 'di lta ste/ o~M tra Ta tra Ta/ tri Ti tri Ti/ tru Tu tru Tu/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang nad thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/ gra sa gra sa/ ma tha ma tha/ pra

477
101-239a ma tha pra ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ snying rjes mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
